summary: For thirty years now Maria and José Ribeiro have been living on the ground floor of a Haussmannian building in one of the most exclusive districts of Paris. Everybody loves this nice couple... See full summary »
cast: Rita Blanco|Joaquim de Almeida|Roland Giraud|Chantal Lauby|Barbara Cabrita|Lannick Gautry|Maria Vieira|Jacqueline Corado|Jean-Pierre Martins|Alex Alves Pereira|Sergio Da Silva|Nicole Croisille|Bertrand Combe|Ludivine de Chastenet|Alexandre Ruscher|Paul Ruscher|Alice Isaaz|Ruben Alves|Olivier Rosemberg|Yann Roussel|Rosaria Da Silva|Manuela Pinheiro|Manuel Ferreira|Sissi Duparc|José da Silva|Jorge Tomé|Cécile Rebboah|Jean Sabernigg|Deivy Fernandes|Patrice Melennec|François Barluet|Guillaume Mélanie|Julia Burgun|Louis Duneton|Jean Franco|Josiane Lévêque|Cécile Cassel|Catarina Wallenstein|Luis Guerreiro|Diogo Clemente|Pauleta|Soraia Chaves|Rogério Samora
title: La jaula dorada
